mapper.select: SELECT MI.MENU_NO , MI.INGREDIENT_NO , O.QUANTITY AS MENU_QUANTITY , I.QUANTITY AS INGREDIENT_QUANTITY , MI.QUANTITY AS NEED_QUANTITY FROM TORDER O , TMENUINGREDIENT MI , TINGREDIENT I WHERE O.MENU_NO = MI.MENU_NO AND MI.INGREDIENT_NO = I.INGREDIENT_NO AND O.ORDER_NO = #{orderNo} AND O.STORE_NO = #{storeNo} AND O.MENU_NO = #{menuNo} AND O.ORDER_STATUS_NO = 'OS001'
